targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

panels.title: Connection Protocol Transition Times  (per Minute in Milliseconds)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

panels.title: Proof Request Protocol Transition Times  (per minute in Milliseconds)
Errors Raised by AcaPy - Admin API (Issuer/Verifier and Holder)
Total Number of HTTP Request to AcaPy without HTTP Code 200
Number of known AcaPy HTTP Errors (per Minute)
Total Number of Errors Reported by AcaPy Webhooks

targets.expr:
count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=error"
    |= "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
[1m])
targets.legendFormat: AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found.

targets.expr:
{app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=error"
    |= "AcaPyPublisher"
    != "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
    != "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Record not found."

panels.title: New Errors Reported by AcaPy Webhooks
